actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roc attacks once with its beak and once with its talons  or makes a beak attack and drops a grappled creature or held object.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6+9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6+9) slashing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 22). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  and the roc can't attack a different target with its talons.

reactions.name: Retributive Strike
reactions.desc: When a creature the roc can see hits it with a melee weapon attack, the roc makes a beak attack against its attacker.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The roc has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The roc deals double damage to objects and structures.
